Text: July Activity Driver Survey Cc in the midst of enhancing the Operations Pricing Model fka Transaction Costing Model and as a result the following applies Do not need the hours surveys completed for July or August Need the activity driver surveys completed for July and August Attached is the activity driver survey for the month of July Please fill out the attached activity driver survey with July numbers for your RC and return to Shari Mao by end of day Friday August During the enhancment period July and August we will be standardizing and consolidating activities across all commodities and operational functions This will result in a shorter survey and easier time assignment to activities for your teams The shorter and easier surveying process will begin with the September survey Please call either me or Shari Mao at or respectively for any clarification Thanks for your patience and help James Scribner

Re Activity Survey June Cc is a reminder that the Activity Survey June as outlined below is due on Friday July Thanks for your help in completing the survey James Scribner Shari CT AM To Bob CT Bryce CT Carrie ct Cheryl CT Daren J CT Faye CT Gordon NRON Judy CT Kathryn CT Kim S CT Linda S CT Lisa CT Mary G CT Michael E CT Pat NRON Rita CT David CT Irene CT Juanita CT Donna CT Bill D ct Connie CT Dan nron Michael CT Dorothy CT Dale CT cc James nron Jennifer CT Lisa B CT Elmo NRON Subject Activity Survey June Attached please find the Activity Survey for the month of June The attached survey drives your costs from your activities to the commercial teams Please select your RCs and fill in the driver quantity for the requested driver for the month of June Please fill out the attached activity driver survey with June numbers for your RC and return to Shari Mao by end of day Friday July If your group currently generates a standard report that captures the surveyed data please send the report to Jennifer Reside and Shari Mao This will eliminate your need to fill out this survey every month If you would like us to collect this information from someone within your team beginning next month please let Jennifer know Please contact Jennifer Reside x or myself with questions or if you are unable to complete the survey within the allotted time Thanks Shari

May Hours Survey Cc find the Hours Survey and Instructions for the month of May I am sending the survey out this time as an opportunity to introduce myself to those of you I have not yet met I am being asked to take a direct roll in the further development and rollout of the Operations Pricing Model fka Transaction Cost Model In the past I have directed the implementation of several pricing systems based on activity based costing similar to the Operations Pricing Model OPM Over the past couple of weeks my observations of the Model have lead me to be concerned with the quality of data used in the model It will take efforts by both you and the OPM team to get to a satisfactory level of data quality This process can start with this months data collection efforts Please pay particular attention this month as the bar is being raised by the management of Energy Operations for data quality and timeliness While completing the survey take this time to review last months numbers Please return these surveys to Shari Mao by end of day Friday June Please note the following changes The Nat Gas RCs will now see deal validation and transportation rate activities therefore these surveys will be notably longer but will not necessarily take more time If the survey does not contain an activity that your team spends time on PLEASE DO NOT TYPE ANY ACTIVITIES IN THE SURVEY Contact Jennifer Reside at to discuss how to proceed If you have any questions relating to the model or this survey or are unable to meet the survey due date please call Jennifer Reside at Shari is on vacation this week

May Activity Survey Cc find the Activity Survey for the month of May I am sending the survey out this time as an opportunity to introduce myself to those of you I have not yet met I am being asked to take a direct roll in the further development and rollout of the Operations Pricing Model fka Transaction Cost Model In the past I have directed the implementation of several pricing systems based on activity based costing similar to the Operations Pricing Model OPM Over the past couple of weeks my observations of the Model have lead me to be concerned with the quality of data used in the model It will take efforts by both you and the OPM team to get to a satisfactory level of data quality This process can start with this months data collection efforts Please pay particular attention this month as the bar is being raised by the management of Energy Operations for data quality and timeliness The attached survey drives your costs from your activities to the commercial teams Please select your RCs and fill in the driver quantity for the requested driver for the month of May Please fill out the attached activity driver survey with May numbers for your RC and return to Shari Mao by end of day Friday June Please note the following updates For Nat Gas Sally Beck is interested in physical as denoted as PH in the survey vs financial as denoted as FI in the survey numbers please provide statistics accordingly If a driver has not been updated per your request please call or email Jennifer Reside If you have additional updates suggestions or items that need correction please call or email Jennifer Reside If your group currently generates a standard report that captures the surveyed data please send the report to Jennifer Reside This will eliminate your need to fill out this survey every month If you would like us to collect this information from someone within your team beginning next month please let Jennifer know Please contact Jennifer Reside x with questions Shari is on vacation this week or if you are unable to complete the survey within the allotted time

OPM Survey Cc reminder today is the deadline for completion of the OPM Survey I am including the body of the email sent Monday in this regards which includes the reference document and the link to the survey Thanks for your help and hard work in this matter OPM SURVEY EMAIL SENT EARLIER As communicated to you in an email dated September we have developed an easier and more efficient method of handling the Operations Pricing Model hours survey using Microsoft Access The NEW IMPROVED survey is ready for your input for the month of September What to do Attached is a reference document that lets you know the purpose of the OPM Hours Survey prerequisites to using the tool helpful hints and contact information Please open and read Click on the attached link to access the OPM Survey Please select OK at the warning message that appears and continue on to the database If you have any questionscomments please contact Suzanne Nicholie at Ext The OPM team is available to support you while using this new tool During the next couple of days one of the OPM team members will be contacting each of you to see if you need help or have any questions We are asking for a quick turn around of the completion of the survey and although it is month end quarter end and the planning process is near completion please complete the OPM Survey using the database by end of day Friday October Thanks James Scribner

OPM Survey Cc to you in an email dated September we have developed an easier and more efficient method of handling the Operations Pricing Model hours survey using Microsoft Access The NEW IMPROVED survey is ready for your input for the month of September What to do Attached is a reference document that lets you know the purpose of the OPM Hours Survey prerequisites to using the tool helpful hints and contact information Please open and read Click on the attached link to access the OPM Survey Please select OK at the warning message that appears and continue on to the database If you have any questionscomments please contact Suzanne Nicholie at Ext The OPM team is available to support you while using this new tool During the next couple of days one of the OPM team members will be contacting each of you to see if you need help or have any questions We are asking for a quick turn around of the completion of the survey and although it is month end quarter end and the planning process is near completion please complete the OPM Survey using the database by end of day Friday October Thanks James Scribner

Operations Pricing Model Hours Survey Cc assisted in the completion of the OPM Hours Survey in the past andor are expected to in the future you will need access to Microsoft Access beginning Wednesday September If you do not have Microsoft Access please go to the enronitcentralcom website and complete an IT application request for Microsoft Access as soon as possible If you are not the individual who will be updating the hours surveys please coordinate with the individual who will and notify Suzanne Nicholie at On Wednesday September a new Hours Survey will be distributed to you and will be due for completion on Wednesday October We have developed what we think to be an easier and more efficient method of handling the Hours Survey using Microsoft Access The Hours Survey is menu driven and you are not expected to need specific Microsoft Access training We will provide help lines and as needed direct training with the roll out of the new Hours Survey If you have any questions please contact anyone in the OPM group Suzanne Nicholie Primary Hours Survey Contact at Shari Mao Jennifer Reside James Scribner Thanks James Scribner

Operations Pricing Model Cc Shari and I would like to schedule an hour of your time from pm to pm on Wednesday October During this time Shari will present to you the September results for the Operations Pricing Model We would also like to give you a briefing of the overall status of the project Let me know if this is a good time Thanks
VAR Training Assessmentis my quick assessment of the VAR training

Merchant Asset GroupThis morning I spent some time with David Maxwell of the Merchant Asset group I am very intrigued by the work the group does Knowing that Todd Hall has moved on to EGM and that the Merchant Asset Group is in transition to report to Shona Wilson I have a recommendation I would like for the Merchant Asset Group to report to me Although I do not know all the methodologies used by the group I am familiar with the valuation of assets and understand the underlying principals for most methods At Fleming I was involved at a much smaller scale in the reporting of similar portfolios and believe that I can be of assistance to the group in moving away from their current spread sheet environment Also I enjoyed talking with David Maxwell and understand what he is up against I believe he and I would work really well together Let me know what you think Thanks James

Class Confirmation James ScribnerScribner is enrolled in Derivatives II Energy Derivatives Advanced Structures Marketing Class Days and Times PM PM PM PM Participant Fee Thank you for your support in providing quality and cost effective development opportunites at Enron Your Company and RC will be charged If you have any questions please call the Development Center Team at Thank you

RE CostRevenue informationbelow email is in regards to the cost charts Sheri asked that I provide to Greg Piper The comment The goal for us is to put the information into a form that I can share with potential external counterparties on Tuesday is why I am forwarding the email to you I will dig deeper to understand the purpose Also Sally the gas chart is for both Financial and Physical and the increase in cost for February is due to social security and unemployment taxes These cost were incorrectly recorded to our cost centers and will be reversed during March Forwarded by James ScribnerCorpEnron on AM From Rex nronXgate on PM To Sheri CT David nronXgate cc James nron Rex nronXgate Subject RE CostRevenue information Hi Sheri I hope your Moms surgery went fine Thanks for pulling the info together I have meetings on Monday until pm but I believe that David can get together with you on Monday morning Perhaps David can pull in someone else from our team also The goal for us is to put the information into a form that I can share with potential external counterparties on Tuesday Thanks again for your help Rex Original Message From Thomas Sheri Sent Friday March PM To Berberian David Shelby Rex Cc Scribner James Subject CostRevenue information DaveRex we have put together some information for you all Unfortunately I need to leave for the day my mom is in surgery this afternoon Can we get together first thing Monday Please leave me a voice mail as I will be checking in today and will have my assistant set something up Thanks Sheri
